rows.label: qev012001_MSG0001
rows.name: Wait a— Huh? Well, this ain't good...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0002
rows.name:
Now what am I— Whoa, Chief? Is that you?!
Fancy meeting you here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0003
rows.name:
Oh, sorry. I'm blocking the way, huh?
Here, just gimme one sec...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0004
rows.name:
Aaand...
Huh? Whoa! Wait! AAAUUUGH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0005
rows.name:
...Phew! That was WAY too close.
Almost took quite a spill there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0006
rows.name:
Man, these are tricky—it's taking me forever to get
used to moving around on them. It's seriously been
one snag after the next since leaving NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0007
rows.name:
Like, a minute ago I was all "ADVENTURE, WOO!
GLOWY FORESTS, YEAH!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0008
rows.name: Basically being a huge idiot. You know? Me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0009
qev012001_MSG0010
rows.name:
Dropped my comm device on the way, too.
Like a genius.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0011
rows.name:
So that means no calling for evac.
Or a cab home. Or pizza delivery.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0012
rows.name:
Oh, SHOOT! I had all those points saved up, too!
One free pie with the works![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0013
rows.name: Typical. I should have used 'em before taking off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0014
rows.name:
What was I talking about? ...Oh, right!
So I need a favor, Chief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0015
rows.name: Can you help me look for my comm device?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0016
rows.name:
It shouldn't take long. I'm sure I dropped it
somewhere around here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0017
rows.name:
Two heads are better than one, right?
And more than two is...better-er? I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_JNK0030
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev012001_SEL0031
rows.name: Assist Mia in her search.

rows.label: qev012001_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev012001_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Mia you don't have the time to help her now.

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0018
rows.name: Ooh, really?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0019
rows.name: Thank you SO much. You're the BEST, Chief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0020
rows.name: Gosh, real BLADEs are all so nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0021
rows.name: Whaaat?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0022
rows.name: You're killing me here, Chief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0023
rows.name:
Help a rookie out here, would you?
Well, I guess I'm not even a proper rookie,
if you want to get all technical...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0024
rows.name: But come on! Have a heart![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0025
rows.name:
Who knows? Maybe I'll be able to repay you
a hundred times over someday![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0026
rows.name: Anyway, let's get this search party started, shall we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0027
rows.name:
You take that direction, and I'll go this way.
If one of us finds my comm device, our secret signal
will be to shriek as loud as we can![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0028
rows.name:
And if you run into hostiles... Um...
I guess you can deal with them yourself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0029
rows.name: Okay, DISPERSE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0030
rows.name: How's it looking, Chief? Any luck?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0031
rows.name:
Thinking back on when I might have dropped
my comm device...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0032
rows.name:
Well, at one point when those indigens were chasing
me south of this tree, I managed a royal face-plant.
Soooo graceful...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0033
rows.name:
Anyway, I remember hearing a big CLUNK then.
I just figured it was my dignity, but...maybe it
was my device? Hope this helps![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0034
rows.name: Any luck finding my comm device, Chief?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0035
rows.name: Yes! That's it! You found it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0036
rows.name:
Wow, I looked FOREVER with no luck.
You're amazing, Chief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0037
rows.name: I owe you big time. Thank you so much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0038
rows.name:
Leave it to an experienced BLADE operative, eh?
You certainly showed me up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0039
rows.name:
I've got to get my act in gear and train up to be
a pro BLADE like you, stat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0040
rows.name:
Thanks again, Chief. You were a big help.
Hopefully we'll meet again sometime![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0041
rows.name:
I'll probably—no, DEFINITELY—be a proper BLADE
by then. Maybe we'll end up competing for jobs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0042
rows.name: Oh, but uh...if so, try and go easy on me, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0043
rows.name: Until then, I'm off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0044
rows.name: You take care out there, Chief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_JNK0010
rows.name: Watch

rows.label: qev012001_SEL0011
rows.name: Watch Mia leave.

rows.label: qev012001_JNK0020
rows.name: Stop

rows.label: qev012001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Mia about your reward.

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0045
rows.name:
Bow chikka wow wowwwwww!
Time for some adveeentuuure...
Dum de-dum duuuummmm...YEAH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0046
rows.name:
Hmm? You say something, Chief? Sorry.
I was kinda composing my theme song.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0047
rows.name:
Were you harmonizing? Aw, that's so sweet!
Thanks, buddy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0048
rows.name: See you around![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0049
rows.name: GAAAH! H-hey, Chief... Little help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0050
rows.name: There was this big rock blocking the road, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0051
rows.name: So I start climbing over it, and it started moving![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0052
rows.name: Now I can't get dooown! HELP![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0053
rows.name: Your adorable protégé is in crisis![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0054
rows.name: ...Wha?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0055
rows.name: Chief! Oh, thank you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0056
rows.name:
I knew you'd come rescue me.
You're so professional and junk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0057
rows.name: But I'll tell you what I DON'T know...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0058
rows.name:
Why does this stuff keep happening to me?!
I'm just trying to get through the forest here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0059
rows.name:
Is this cosmic payback for stiffing you back there?
You know, karma? Or...whatever?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0060
rows.name:
Or wait... You have eerie cursing powers!
Aw, you wouldn't curse little old Mia, right, Chief?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0061
rows.name:
ANYway, I'm safe, you're safe...
All's well that ends well, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0062
rows.name:
Though it might not be a bad idea for me to learn
how to use a gun, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0063
rows.name: Hmm... Not really my style, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0064
rows.name:
Yes! Well. The real take-home here is that this forest
and I are a terrible match.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0065
rows.name:
I am OVER it! From here on, I'll stick to exploring
east of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0066
rows.name:
Thanks again for bailing me out on a regular basis
here, Chief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0067
rows.name:
I'll let you get back to your own adventures.
Stay safe, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012001_MSG0068
rows.name: Happy trails![ST:wait ]
